column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Gratt is seething with fury.
Weaken Gulg knockers, then capture them with coils of wire.
Deliver the captured knockers to Gratt.
I've just about bloody had it! No more! I'll not stand by and see another theft go unanswered!
Eh? What am I angry about!? Well, it's them blasted knockers, ain't it!
Those grabby bastards latch onto anything─ore, hammers, my favorite bloody pick─and drag it back to their nests! And what for, I ask you!? The little buggers don't even have the concept of value!
I swear there'll be no end to this until I teach 'em the error of their ways. Here's the deal, friend: help me catch some of those thieving pests, and I'll see you paid for the trouble. You in?

Good. I'll be going south, so you head east until you find a couple of knockers to knock about. Once they're reeling, use this wire to bind those wriggling limbs of theirs, then bring them back here to the village.
Take that wire, and snare me a couple of knockers! There's a nest of the sneaky blighters over to the east!
Back already, eh? I managed to catch a few myself, but let's see your haul.

If I'm being honest, I was worried that <Switch(PlayerParameter(71))><Case(1)>an outsider</Case><Case(2)>an outsider</Case><Case(3)>a dwarf</Case><Case(4)>an outsider</Case><Case(5)>an outsider</Case><Case(6)>an outsider</Case><Case(7)>an outsider</Case><Case(8)>an outsider</Case></Switch> unfamiliar with the area might walk <If(PlayerParameter(4))>herself<Else/>himself</If> straight into a pack of hungry iguanas. Glad you proved me wrong!
...Now, my prehensile pretties! Uncle Gratt is going to teach you to stop stealing ore from the Tholls...and start nicking it from the Goggs instead! Mwahahaha!
